innobit_Expansion.LED_setPixelColor3: Set the colors of three pixels
innobit_Expansion.LED_setPixelColor32:
Set the colors of three pixels

 with RGB values
innobit_Expansion.MP_Servo.maxAngle: Get the maximum angle for the servo
innobit_Expansion.MP_Servo.minAngle: Gets the minimum angle for the servo
innobit_Expansion.colors: Get the RGB value of a known color
innobit_Expansion.motor_M1:
Initialise motor M1
 Set the motor speed
 (-255 to 255)
innobit_Expansion.motor_M2:
Initialise motor M2
 Set the motor speed
 (0 to 255)
innobit_Expansion.readData: Get the temperature and humidity from DHT11 sensor
innobit_Expansion.readhumidity: Get the humidity from DHT11 sensor
innobit_Expansion.readtemperature: Get the temperature from DHT11 sensor
